name: The Poker Player
credits:
HSymbol - original game
Rita-Bernstein - ZHS translation
description:
Adds a character called The Poker Player, who fights with his own rule inspired from poker.

- Adds 87 cards and 13 relics.
- Disables some base game contents which are unbalanced or confusing to the Poker Player. If you don't like this behavior, check out the mod config.

v1.0.5 (2020-11-30)
- Update for Slay the Spire v2.2
- Fix The Library event having duplicate Poker cards.

v1.0.6 (2020-12-21)
- Bugfix: The Die is Cast no longer rolls the same number repeatedly.

v1.0.7 (2020-01-21)
- Bugfix: Wild Card can no longer give you Hearts with Broken Clock relic.

For the full patch notes, visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1710999325
